pull.title: c++20: Opt-in to modeling view and borrowed_range for Span

events.message:
Opt-in to modeling view and borrowed_range for Span

This matches the behavior of std::span, as Span satisfies the same concepts.

events.body: So the idea, as I understand, is that this adds compile-time checking capabilities a bit like rust? Yes that's really neat.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
